subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN4416, how did it go?
description_text:
I did not receive the item yet thanks


On Fri 2 Jan 2026, 2:30 PM SIMSONN, <no-reply@loox.io> wrote:

> Hello Philip john, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and
> feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only
> takes a few
